beer.beer_description:
This tasty NZ IPA is made with NZ hops for a bold local flavor. Tropical fruits, clean citrus notes, and a hint of passionfruit will reverberate around your taste buds. 
As a young man, Richard was a huge fan of the Dunedin Sound. Being deaf, he couldn’t hear the music, but he could feel it. From the jangling guitars reverberating through the gigs. This beer is a tribute to The Sound, made with NZ hops for a bold local flavor, that will reverberate around your taste buds.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 130 distinct venues!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 140 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 29!

Hiking, fishing, swimming - there are so many wonderful things to do while you enjoy the great outdoors. Even beer is better when surrounded by the beauty of nature. That's 15 different venues categorized as Great Outdoors. Visit 5 more for Level 4!

What goes with a long hike, a crackling fire, and a sky full of stars? Why, a cold beer, of course. Take only pictures, leave only check-ins. That's 5 different beers at a campground! Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 65 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 14!
